pre_caption: This is a static, wide-angle shot of a modern, glass-faced skyscraper. The building's reflective surface mirrors the surrounding cityscape and a helipad on a nearby structure. In the background, a sprawling urban area with numerous buildings stretches out towards hazy hills on the horizon.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
